author: mamta
msg: This method fixes LikeEscapeOperatorNode so that it will check the collation derivation too rather than only checking the
collation type. This fix will make sure that if one side of the LIKE operation has collation derivation of NONE and the
other side has collation derivation of IMPLICIT, then we should throw an exception.

author: felicity
msg: Put in a new rule that looks for MIME eplilogues (data after the closing
boundary).  It's a really quick thing to test for, and has an ok hit rate in
